title: Snapp's Ferry Packing Company Recalls Beef Product Due To Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 20, 2016 Snapps Ferry Packing Company, an Afton, Tenn. establishment, is recalling approximately 410 pounds of beef product that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The ground beef item was...

establishment.name: Snapps Ferry Packing Company
establishment.address:
